thread.title: How Cindy Crawford ended up in George Clooney’s bed
thread.title_full: How Cindy Crawford ended up in George Clooney’s bed | DailyTelegraph

author: Network Writers
title: How Cindy Crawford ended up in George Clooney’s bed
text:
GEORGE Clooney has shared details of how he ended up in bed with his best mate’s wife, none other than supermodel Cindy Crawford.
The Ocean’s Eleven star was joined by Crawford and her husband, Rande Gerber, at the joint launch of his Casamingos Tequila venture with Clooney and her modelling book.
Clooney told Extra that tequila may have played a role the night that Crawford hopped into his bed.
“She can’t help herself,” he joked. “No, it was one of the funnier, like, drunken nights out at their house.
“We, you know, had a couple of drinks and then couldn’t go home and went to sleep and she thought I was Rande ... and she hopped in my bed. That was pretty funny,” he said.
Not tonight, Cindy ... George Clooney, right, chats with model Cindy Crawford. Picture: AP Gerber said he and Clooney have always had a love for tequila.
Other Stories Hero took five bullets to stop gunman 0 comments Police building had been ‘cased’ News 0 comments First wife ‘neglected’ by cricket legend Nsw Rochelle’s sad story remains Russell’s agony Sydney Confidential Family horrified by paedo’s history News NSW police worker, gunman shot dead Breaking News “George and I started drinking tequila a very long time ago. There came a point when George said to me, “Why don’t we just make our own.” We never meant it to be a business,” he said. “We started out just us drinking it, without anyone being able to buy a bottle. We were kind of forced into [making it a business].
“After about two years, we got a call from our distillery and they said to us, “We have a situation. For the past two years, we’ve sent you a thousand bottles a year. Either you’re selling it, or you’re drinking way too much. You need to get licensed and get legit with the situation.”’
Good friends ... George Clooney photobombs longtime friends Randy Gerber and wife Cindy Crawford in Ibiza. Picture: Instagram Crawford is very supportive of the endeavour.
“It’s so fun because Rande is such a bar guy and a night-life guy, and then for him to finally kind of culminate his career with doing a tequila that we really just did for ourselves and friends, and then turn it into a business.” she told Us Weekly .
Originally published as How Cindy ended up in George’s bed
